comments: Amy is such a nice lady. Can be a tough grader, but she\'s really nice and all the speeches are pretty easy. Plus she gives you candy. There\'s no reason not to take her.

about halfway through this class. easiest class I have ever taken. she is the nicest lady. only stay for about 30 minutes each time. If you don\'t get an A you either didn\'t go to class or you should probably not be in college.
Easiest speech class ever. The longest speech is 8 minutes and its in a group of 4. If you have an A going into the final you don\'t have to take it. She gives you candy

Prof. Sill is such a wonderful lady. She has food and goodies all the time. She gives extra credit after every test and you do in class activities that if you are there you get all the points. she will also give out extra creditt just because! She is a super easy A. You dont need book, so dont buy it. Go to class and your guaranteed an A.
She is a really nice lady and her class was pretty easy. You get so many easy points that it doesn\'t matter if you don\'t do great on your speech. Definitely a teacher to take for public speaking.
extra credit omg! take her its easy. she is very nice, but ethics sucks. she gives a review before the tests, and alot of the grade is in class work.EXTRA CREDIT!!!!!!!!!

She\'s a lot of fun and very dedicated to her students. Take the time to get to know her because it will help your grade. She\'s always willing to help you but the class is pretty easy and straightforward so yo shouldn\'t need the help. She is a lecturer for fun who teaches because she likes to be involved with people and likes speaking.
